divs: sighting details12\2\10 around my 1st break @work in fullerton,ca, i noticed the sun shining above with some very thin dusting of cloud or vapor layers in the atmosphere. what caught my eye was a very bright light ray (beam) aiming directly from the sun through this atmospheric made prism causing 1 circle of intense rainbow color except the light beam continued through the point of origin & remained constant. the same white ray of light. basically, a light beam. note, the military transport helicopters were in action. coincidence? all afternoon? i left work at 145p, drove down brea blvd in search of a good gas station. i then noticed that the sun now had 2 of the same prism points on ea side. ex. east point & west point. i took several pics via my samsung epic phone. hopefully, it will upload. after i stopped for gas on harbor & the 91fwy, i noticed another militart carrier\copter flying near by. then asherriff copter as well. please note, that today, 12\2\10, had a lot of chem\contrails from jets in the sky. could be due to the atmospheric change in temp...i am typing on my phone, so i do apologize for any misspellings. also on one of the pics or both, there was awhite dot or orb showing near the sun with a red glow around it. i used 4x zoom with 5mp camera phone. maybe its a reflection bounce back on the camera lens. but it was huge and took up a portion of the southern sw sky.also around 730p. near the 91 fwy western sky, a blue flash of light occured. 3rdly, 2 wks ago my son, 19, witnessed a bright white light flash upon the side of his face on a mon night, 11\22\10 11pm pst, n long beach,ca. it lit up the ky. on 11\23\10 he ran into an aquaintance whom had asked him if dhe was outside around 11pm the night before & asked him if he had noticed a bright light in the sky. coincidence?? this young man also stated that he was on market \long beachblvd @11pm. 11\22\10 w\ friends(this was apprx 1-2 miles from our home) & that some people had stared into the light & got sick. trash can lids lifted in the air & when the light had gone the lids fell back down. a friend of mine too that stays near hollywood,ca heard rumors about the light in the sky, originating near mojave desert.
Summary: Rainbow/prismatic event occurance from the sun
trends: There have been no other sightings in All cities West&91W
This sighting has never been favorited.
